title: Cyborg Central.
content:
Welcome to Cyborg Central! ðŸ¤–

Our website is dedicated to all things cyborg-related. Here, you'll find the latest news and updates on advancements in cyborg technology, as well as discussions and debates on the ethical implications of merging man and machine.

Whether you're a cyborg enthusiast or simply curious about the future of humanity, we invite you to join our community and engage in thoughtful conversations with like-minded individuals.

So come explore the world of cyborgs with us, and discover what the future has in store for humanity!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An illustration of a cyborg with a metallic body and glowing eyes"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
